Instructions for creating Missing itocroot user fro i.saster Recovery

  • Make a copy of /etc/security/passwd 
     sudo cp /etc/security/passwd /etc/security/passwd-copyforDR
  • Mkae a copy of /etc/password 
     sudo cp /etc/passwd /etc/passwd-copyforDR
  • Edit the /etc/security/password file 
     vi /etc/security/passwd
  • Add the following lines make sure that there is a blank line between the last line in the file and the first line you are adding 
     itocroot:
        password = 9TnTctGVVeYok
        lastupdate = 1445455893
  • Save the file
  • Edit the /etc/passwrd file 
     sudo vi /etc/passwd
  • Add the following line to the end of the file 
     itocroot:!:0:0:Itocroot:/home/itocroot:/usr/bin/ksh
  • Save the file
  • Create the itocroot users home directory 
     sudo mkir /home/itocroot
  • Continue with the DR instructions for setting the itocroot password
